title: Is Twich an ADC or jungler
body: In season 5 most people think that Twich{{champion:29}}  is an ADC,but now in season 6, most people use Twich{{champion:29}}  as an jungler, but still, some use it as an ADC, any advice?Should Twich be an ADC or jungler?

replies.body:
adc = attack damage carry.

hes still an adc when played in the jungle instead of bot.
He is an ADC. Jungle can be done but he has poor clear times and also poor ganks unless he has 2-3 items in.

he is an adc or at least  created for that position . Is lux a mid or a supp . Is lulu a mid or a support . Is nautilus a supp or a top . Well that all depends on the champ kits  , his overall stats and how they grow up with items .  So give it a try as a jng but I really prefer him as and ADC

> [{quoted}](name=Herny knock down,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=weujEgMv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-07T17:51:14.820+0000)
>
> he is an adc or at least  created for that position . Is lux a mid or a supp . Is lulu a mid or a support . Is nautilus a supp or a top . Well that all depends on the champ kits  , his overall stats and how they grow up with items .  So give it a try as a jng but I really prefer him as and ADC

you forget nautilus is a jungler too
He's played bot lane much more than anywhere else.
tbh hes not an adc. hes an assassin
He's def an adc, ppl usually jungle him for fun. Though Im sure some take twitch jg quite seriously and have fair success. It's less than ideal in most cases, for most people.
I used twitch mid a bit a this season. I topped because I couldn't carry as well as karthus or tf mid

hes ADC, his jungling is sub par because of his slow clear times, long CD's and the high amount of damage he takes. he needs items to be effective. 

people take him jungle because it can be done, its just highly specific in which you want a twitch jungle. but as always, 2v1's and just showing up behind someone is OP AF.
